pterodactyl.key: Your Pterodactyl Application API key (ptla_...) with all permissions
pterodactyl.clientKey: Your Pterodactyl Client API key (ptlc_...) - OPTIONAL for power control. See POWER_CONTROL.md
pterodactyl._comment: Application key (ptla_) for admin operations. Client key (ptlc_) enables server power control. Two options: 1) Set clientKey here for global use (easier), OR 2) Pass pteroKey in each API request (flexible). See POWER_CONTROL.md for details.

announcement.message: Welcome to our dashboard! Check out our new features.
announcement._comment: Announcement banner settings. Types: info (blue), success (green), warning (yellow), error (red)

socialMedia._comment: Social media and service links displayed in footer. Supports 25+ icons including social platforms and service pages.

website.secret: Default Secret (Change this to any string you want)

api.code: Default API Key (Change this to any string you want)

joinguild._comment: The Discord bot must be in these servers and have invite permissions. Automatic guild joining will not work unless role packages are configured correctly. You can always just set it to a random role & package so that only this works.

giverole._comment: Auto-join must be enabled for this to work - or the user must already be in your Discord. This will give the user a role when they login.

passwordgenerator.note: Use this to disable registering on Helium.

renewsuspendsystem._comment: Server renewal system - servers expire and can be renewed with coins
renewsuspendsystem._renewalperiod_note: Days a server lasts before requiring renewal
renewsuspendsystem._renewalcost_note: Coins required to renew a server for the renewal period
renewsuspendsystem._autosuspend_note: Automatically suspend servers after grace period expires
renewsuspendsystem._autorenewal_note: Allow users to enable automatic renewal with their coins
renewsuspendsystem._deletionperiod_note: Days after suspension before server is deleted (0 to disable auto-deletion)

oauth2._comment: Go to https://discord.dev/ and create an application to set up OAuth2. This is required for Helium to work. You must also set the redirect URL to the link below.

ip._note: Anti-alt checks will not work if you are proxying through Cloudflare. This is due to the fact that Cloudflare does not pass the real IP address through the headers. If you are using Cloudflare, please disable this feature.

max._comment: Maximum resources a user can have (including purchases from store)

rolePackages.note: This allows you to set a different plan/package to people who have a specific role however this requires the Discord bot to be configured and functioning. This is mainly used for Boost rewards.

userMaxResources._comment: Override maximum resources for specific Discord users. Leave empty {} if not used. Takes priority over package max limits.

123456789012345678._comment: Set to 0 for unlimited, or remove the Discord ID entry to use package defaults

thresholds._comment: Threshold percentages for warnings and critical alerts

alerts._comment: Send health alerts to a webhook (separate from main webhook)

tax._note: Percentage of the transfer amount that is taken as tax (0-100)

dailyRewards._comment: Daily login rewards system - encourage users to return daily
dailyRewards._baseReward_note: Base coins awarded for daily login

streakBonus._bonusPerDay_note: Additional coins per day of streak (e.g., day 5 = 10 base + 25 bonus)
streakBonus._maxStreak_note: Maximum streak days for bonus calculation

lottery._comment: Lottery/Raffle system where users buy tickets for a chance to win prizes
lottery._ticketCost_note: Cost per lottery ticket in coins
lottery._maxTicketsPerUser_note: Maximum tickets one user can buy per round
lottery._autoStart_note: Automatically start new rounds when previous round ends

prizeDistribution._comment: How prize pool is distributed to winner
prizeDistribution._coinsPercentage_note: Percentage of ticket sales given as coin prize (20% house edge)

lottery._minTicketsToDrawin_note: Minimum tickets sold before a winner can be drawn

marketplace._comment: User-to-user trading marketplace for resources and coins
marketplace._tradingFee_note: Percentage fee charged on marketplace sales (0-100)
marketplace._listingDuration_note: Days a listing stays active before expiring
marketplace._minPrice_note: Minimum price in coins for a listing

allowedResources._comment: Which resources can be traded on marketplace

priceRanges._comment: Min/max prices to prevent extreme listings

linkvertise._comment: Configure Linkvertise earning with one-time token system
linkvertise._dailyLimit_note: Maximum number of times a user can use Linkvertise per day (0 = unlimited)

rewardsads._comment: Configure RewardsAds earning - Get credentials from dash.rewardsx.net
rewardsads._note: Get these values from your RewardsX dashboard at dash.rewardsx.net
rewardsads._dailyLimit_note: Maximum number of times a user can use RewardsAds per day (0 = unlimited)

afk._note: This is the 2nd-generation version of Helium's AFK system. Please report any bugs on the GitHub (github.com/heliactyloss/heliactyl). Thank you.

antivpn.note: For this to work, generate an API Key on https://proxycheck.io/. If you do not put a key, Helium will automatically disable anti-VPN.

whitelist.note: This allows only specific people to be able to login to the Helium dashboard. This does not affect your Panel.

logging._note: This is the 2nd-generation version of Helium's logging system. Please report any bugs on the GitHub (github.com/heliactyloss/heliactyl). Thank you.
